goal.com/2015/03/real-madrid-could-not-c.title: Real Madrid could not cope with Schalke's courage, says Nastasic...
goal.com/2015/03/real-madrid-could-not-c.snippet: Schalke defender Matija Nastasic feels Real Madrid were unable to cope with the Bundesliga side's courageous display in Tuesday's Champions League encounter at the Santiago Bernabeu.

goal.com/2015/03/sergio-ramos-absence-pr.title: Sergio Ramos absence proves Real Madrid man is the best...
goal.com/2015/03/sergio-ramos-absence-pr.snippet: Real Madrid have long been accused of over-reliance on one player; Cristiano Ronaldo's two goals in midweek against Schalke salvaged something approaching respectability in a 4-3 defeat when all around him was chaos.

espnfc.us/2015/03/real-madrid-edge-schal.snippet: Real Madrid may have lost on the night to Schalke, but the fans should still remember they are in the Champions League quarterfinals.

theguardian.com/2015/03/real-madrid-3-4-.title: Real Madrid 3-4 Schalke (Real win 5-4 on agg) Champions...
theguardian.com/2015/03/real-madrid-3-4-.snippet: Schalke came close to delivering one of great Champions League shocks, winning 4-3 at Real Madrid but losing the last-16 tie 5-4 on aggregate.

espnfc.us/2015/03/real-madrid-progress-d.snippet: Real Madrid progressed to the Champions League quarterfinals despite a shock 4-3 defeat at home to Schalke.

theguardian.com/2015/03/real-madrid-v-sc.title: Real Madrid v Schalke: Champions League as it happened...
theguardian.com/2015/03/real-madrid-v-sc.snippet: Minute-by-minute report: Real Madrid sneaked through to the quarters despite Schalke winning by the odd goal in seven on a whirlwind night at the Bernabeu. Scott Murray was watching, and typing quite quickly.

espnfc.us/2015/03/highlights-real-madrid.snippet: Klaas Jan Huntelaar scored twice to lead Schalke, but Cristiano Ronaldo and Real Madrid found a way, as Los Blancos advanced to the Champions League.
